description:
This is the scariest adventure game on iOS: Zombie Door Escape

* * * This is the premium version without ads * * *

Zombie Door Escape is the best free to play point and click adventure game!

Can you escape nasty zombies? Discover scary hidden secrets & avoid enemies!

It's time to get out of this city of horror & fear in this hardest game ever!

Do you accept the challenge? Your mission is to test your skills to escape this scary adventure full of haunted
houses and get rid of scary ghosts! Time to solve this mystery!

With this classic point and click adventure game, you will have hours of fun gaming in this thriller!

Zombie Door Escape will take you on an epic quest into the heart of this terrifying village with haunted house and a wealthy realm threatened by vicious zombies, dangerous ghosts and scary animals!

Zombie Door Escape Awesome Features:
* Hours of Free Game Play with horror filled manors
* Classic Point & Click adventure games (classic 90s oldies games)
* Smooth & Amazing gameplay full of twists and puzzles
* Intelligent Puzzle Design
* Spooky, mysterious and horror sound effects
* Addictive storyline: you will fight hard to find the solution!
* Beautiful graphics bring the creepy Manor/House of Fear to life
* Complete chapters all for FREE
* Complex & Unique escape challenges
* Gather tools, Find objects and items to facilitate your escape!
* Discover the mystery of this creepy city. Where are the zombies? And why?
* Solve devious puzzles and riddles!
* Find hidden objects that help you break free!
* Amazing visual style & great story line
* Addicting mini puzzles
* One of the best adventure gaming experience and a fun point n click game
* It’s 100% free! No registration, no hassles, just download and play

If you love point ‘n’ click adventure games, please download Zombie Door Escape NOW! This story line will creep you out!
